TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewCancelEditEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件时取消按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"Cancel") 单击后，但在退出之前编辑模式。The control raises the event when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before exiting edit mode. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如，如果它会将该行放入某种意外状态，每次此事件发生时停止取消操作的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs. 一个对象传递给事件处理方法，以便您可以确定引发事件的取消按钮所在行的索引，还可以指示是否应停止取消操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止取消操作，请设置属性设置为`true`。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象传递给事件处理方法，以确定用户单击取消按钮所在的行的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button clicked by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/CS/gridviewrowcancellingeditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/VB/gridviewrowcancellingeditvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`rowIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取引发事件的“取消”按钮所在的行的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

value.span: 引发事件的“取消”按钮所在的行的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用户单击属性，以确定包含取消按钮的行的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row that contains the Cancel button clicked by the user. 行索引通常用于检索从此行的集合控件，它允许您访问的行的属性。The row index is often used to retrieve this row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用用户单击属性，以确定包含取消按钮的行的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button clicked by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/CS/gridviewrowcancellingeditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/VB/gridviewrowcancellingeditvb.aspx#1)]
